title: [L2M] - Start Adaptation of the oPOM2MAPI integration for Order Decomposition of Change Orders
acceptance_criteria: The Tariff Change orders can be decomposed from intermediate to partial order structure
The Modify orders can be decomposed frin Intermediate to partial order structure

Following actions are executed as part of the decomposition
The Product and Product Offering Nomenclature for Tariffs and addons are aligned to  MAPI standard 
KLS Id to GAM conversion is  executed
Temporary CDP Id for the Order Process is generated in CDP
Condition Ids are validated
Tariff change offereabilits rules are validated against the standard Produktwechsel Matrices
In case of Modify the changed addons are validated
The Product and Product Offering Nomenclature for Tariffs and addons are aligned to  MAPI standard
KLS Id to GAM conversion is  executed
Temporary CDP Id for the Order Process is generated in CDP
Tariff change offereabilits rules are validated against the standard Produktwechsel Matrices
In case of Modify the changed addons are validated
The partial order structure generated aligns with oPOM requirements
